name: Illusion (itch) (ocean)
description:
Illusion

Illusion is a game created for the Brackeys 2022.1 game jam.

Fast-paced spot the difference gameplay!

Find the illusions and try to get the highest score you can.

Controls:

  • Left-click to select a tile
  • Right-click to use a skip charge
  • M to toggle audio
  • ESC to pause/resume
